UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Peptides from the Intestinal Tract of Breast Milk-Fed Infants Have Antimicrobial and Bifidogenic Activity.
Literature.Author: Beverly RL, Woonnimani P, Scottoline BP, Lueangsakulthai J, Dallas DC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=>3000µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>3000µg/ml),Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis(MIC=>3000µg/ml)
